Interface w3c.thotlib.ButtonCallback

public interface interface ButtonCallback
This is the interface for a Java Button Callback.

The callback method is called each time the user pressed associated button.

The binding between the Button and the ButtonCallback is done at the button's creation.

callback(int, int)
This method is called each time the user pressed a button

callback 
 public abstract void callback(int document,
                               int view)
This method is called each time the user pressed a button

Parameters:
document - document number
view - view number
